# a\(n\) \= \(2^n \+ 1\)^3\.
https://oeis.org/A343318

## Mathematica
```Mathematica
(2^Range[0, 25] + 1)^3 (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 11 2021 *)
```
## Python
```Python
def A343318(n): return (2**n+1)**3 # _Chai Wah Wu_, Feb 03 2022
```
